name: mistrustfully
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows you have doubts about the honesty or abilities of someone, or that shows you have doubts about whether something is good, safe, true etc.: She stared mistrustfully at them. See
mistrustful
More examplesFewer examplesMeredith poked mistrustfully at the colourful heap on her plate with the fork. He stood in the middle of the room and stared mistrustfully round him, wondering why he should be so favoured.Some people automatically respond mistrustfully at the mention of the word “politician”.
